author: CBC News
title: Coronavirus: What's happening in Canada and around the world Monday
description: Politicians and health officials are facing more questions about what's being done to protect the elderly as COVID-19 outbreaks hit seniors' homes and long-term care facilities across Canada. Here's a look at what's happening in Canada and around the world.
content:
The latest: 
Politicians and health officials are facing more questions about what's being done to protect the elderly as COVID-19 outbreaks hit seniors' homes and long-term care facilities across Canada.
